name: rrxtps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), cngp))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ c1, (RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp, (RR^ ` c0)∈ NrmGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), cngp))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(RR^ ` c0)∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ NrmGrp →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)

⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ NrmGrp →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))

comment: Generalized Euclidean real spaces are topological spaces. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
